pages.text: Welcome to $(jewel)Jewel Charms$(), an enchanting system that allows you to enhance your tools and weapons with powerful magical gems!$(br2)Unlike traditional enchantments, jewels are $(important)crafted from materials$() that determine their effects, and can be $(important)attached directly to your items$() for instant power.

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: $(bold)1. Create Rough Jewel$()$(br)Use the $(l:getting_started/crafting_jewels)Jewel Creation Station$() to combine materials into a rough jewel.$(br2)$(bold)2. Polish It$()$(br)Polish the rough jewel at the $(l:getting_started/polish_station)Polish Station$() to create a finished jewel.$(br2)$(bold)3. Attach to Items$()$(br)Use a $(l:getting_started/attaching_jewels)Jewel Socket Template$() at a Smithing Table to attach jewels.$(br2)$(bold)4. Enjoy the Power$()$(br)Your item now has the jewel's effect!

pages.title: Key Features
pages.text: $(li)$(jewel)42 unique effects$() across 5 categories$(li)$(tool)30+ materials$() to discover$(li)$(important)Stack multiple jewels$() on one item$(li)$(special)Visible jewel overlays$() show your power$(li)$(important)Fully configurable$() effects and materials
